CustomField.description: AD-821 - Progress image for an action plan
CustomField.formula: IF( No_of_Actions_Overdue__c > 0, IMAGE("/resource/ProgressBarRed", "Red", 18, 100), IF( Total_No_of_Actions__c = 0, IMAGE("/resource/ProgressBarGrey", "Grey", 18, 100), IMAGE("/resource/ProgressBarGreen", "Green", 18,(100 * (No_of_Actions_Complete__c / Total_No_of_Actions__c))) & IMAGE("/resource/ProgressBarGrey", "Grey", 18,(100 * (No_of_Actions_Pending__c / Total_No_of_Actions__c))) ) )
CustomField.label: Progress
